alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 04 at 10:22PM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Douglas and Bayfield Counties. In Minnesota, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band, the Grand Portage Reservation and the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will be lowest within a few miles of the Lake Superior shoreline, but should improve farther away from the lake.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
